articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: In war of Tweets, Iran calls Trump 'terrorist in suit'
articles.description: Iran called Donald Trump a 'terrorist in a suit' on Sunday, hours after the U.S. president said he was ready to hit 52 sites if Tehran retaliated over the killing of top commander Qassem Soleimani. Julian Satterthwaite reports.
articles.content:
Posted 
Iran called Donald Trump a 'terrorist in a suit' on Sunday, hours after the U.S. president said he was ready to hit 52 sites if Tehran retaliated over the killing of top commander Qassem Soleimani. Julian Satterthwaite reports.

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: India's T20 against Sri Lanka abandoned due to rain
articles.description: The first of the three Twenty20 internationals between India and Sri Lanka at Guwahati was called off due to rain on Sunday.
articles.content:
MUMBAI (Reuters) - The first of the three Twenty20 internationals between India and Sri Lanka at Guwahati was called off due to rain on Sunday. 
It started raining at the Barsapara Cricket Stadium after India captain Virat Kohli had won the toss and opted to… [+227 chars]

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Arsenal beat Birmingham, Kerr makes winning WSL debut with Chelsea
articles.description: Arsenal began 2020 with a 2-0 win over Birmingham City while Australia international striker Sam Kerr got off to a winning start at Chelsea, who came from a goal down to beat Reading 3-1 as the FA Women's Super League resumed on Sunday.
articles.content:
LONDON (Reuters) - Arsenal began 2020 with a 2-0 win over Birmingham City while Australia international striker Sam Kerr got off to a winning start at Chelsea, who came from a goal down to beat Reading 3-1 as the FA Women’s Super League resumed on Sunday. 
K… [+1218 chars]

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Soccer-Balotelli says Lazio fans should be ashamed after insults
articles.description: Brescia striker Mario Balotelli told Lazio fans they should be ashamed of themselves after saying he had been subjected to insults from them during a Serie A match between the two sides on Sunday.
articles.content:
BRESCIA, Italy, Jan 5 (Reuters) - Brescia striker Mario Balotelli told Lazio fans they should be ashamed of themselves after saying he had been subjected to insults from them during a Serie A match between the two sides on Sunday. 
“Lazio fans present at the… [+769 chars]

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Iran's retaliation for Soleimani death to include Haifa, Israeli military centers: ex-commander
articles.description: A former chief of Iran’s elite Revolutionary Guards said on Sunday the Israeli city of Haifa and Israeli military centers would be included in Tehran's retaliation over the killing of Iran's pre-eminent military commander Qassem Soleimani.
articles.content: DUBAI (Reuters) - A former chief of Iran’s elite Revolutionary Guards said on Sunday the Israeli city of Haifa and Israeli military centers would be included in Tehran’s retaliation over the killing of Iran’s pre-eminent military commander Qassem Soleimani. … [+288 chars]

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Hezbollah leader says he warned Soleimani of assassination threat
articles.description: Hezbollah leader Sayyed Hassan Nasrallah said on Sunday he had warned Iranian Major General Qassem Soleimani of the risk of assassination and met him in the Lebanese capital Beirut on New Year's Day before he was killed in a U.S. attack in Baghdad.
articles.content: BEIRUT (Reuters) - Hezbollah leader Sayyed Hassan Nasrallah said on Sunday he had warned Iranian Major General Qassem Soleimani of the risk of assassination and met him in the Lebanese capital Beirut on New Year’s Day before he was killed in a U.S. attack in … [+1183 chars]

articles.title: 'The Grudge' Kicks Off 2020 Box Office as 'Rise of Skywalker' Rules Again
articles.description: LOS ANGELES, (Variety.com) - Sony and Screen Gems' "The Grudge" ignited the 2020 box office, scaring up $11.3 million in domestic ticket sales over the weekend.
articles.content:
LOS ANGELES, (Variety.com) - Sony and Screen Gems’ “The Grudge” ignited the 2020 box office, scaring up $11.3 million in domestic ticket sales over the weekend. 
“The Grudge,” the first new movie to open nationwide this year, was scorned by audiences and cri… [+2325 chars]

articles.author: Laila Bassam
articles.title: Hezbollah: U.S. forces in Middle East to go home in coffins
articles.description: Hezbollah leader Sayyed Hassan Nasrallah said on Sunday the U.S. military in the Middle East would pay the price for the killing of Iranian Major General Qassem Soleimani, warning that U.S. soldiers and officers would return home in coffins.

articles.title: Arab league chief concerned about Iraq developments, calls for calm
articles.description: Arab League Secretary General Ahmed Aboul Gheit on Sunday expressed his growing concern about the successive developments in Iraq and called for calm, the organization said in a statement.
articles.content:
CAIRO (Reuters) - Arab League Secretary General Ahmed Aboul Gheit on Sunday expressed his growing concern about the successive developments in Iraq and called for calm, the organization said in a statement.

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: East Libyan oil terminals shut due to bad weather - port sources
articles.description: All the four east Libyan oil export terminals were closed on Sunday due to bad weather, port sources said.
articles.content:
BENGHAZI, Jan 5 (Reuters) - All the four east Libyan oil export terminals were closed on Sunday due to bad weather, port sources said. 
The closed terminals - Zueitina, Brega, Ras Lanuf and Es Sider - are located in the so-called Libya’s oil crescent. 
The … [+304 chars]
